data.title: Broadleaf
data.meta_description: Achieving successful mission outcomes and elevated performance for federal civilian, defense and intelligence agencies, while building an enduring enterprise focused on customers, employees and shareholders.
data.text:
ASRC Federal is the government services subsidiary of Arctic Slope Regional Corporation, an Alaska Native Corporation owned by 13,000 Iñupiat shareholders. Our family of companies provides a broad range of services and technical expertise to federal government agencies – with operations spanning 44 states, districts and territories – led by a highly-skilled, purpose-driven and diverse team of roughly 8,000 employees who are committed to helping customers achieve successful mission outcomes.

ASRC Federal Announces New Chief Information Officer John Pisano

Press Release

ASRC Federal announces John Pisano as its new Chief Information Officer (CIO). Pisano will lead the corporate information technology strategy and partner with customers across the enterprise to advance ASRC Federal’s IT systems and processes. Pisano brings more ...read more

DLA and ASRC Federal Partner to Improve Supply Chain Support to Warfighters

Featured Article, Press Release

The Defense Logistics Agency (DLA), Land and Maritime Directorates of Supplier Operations and ASRC Federal have forged a partnership aimed at strengthening supply chain support to our nation’s warfighters. The goal of the alliance is to implement joint strategies ...read more

ASRC Federal Announces Joe Winthrop as Chief Financial Officer

Press Release

ASRC Federal has named Joe Winthrop as its new Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Winthrop has more than 20 years of experience in key finance roles. Before joining ASRC Federal, he served as senior vice president of finance for the $5B defense and civilian group at read more

ASRC Federal Completes Acquisition of SAIC’s Logistics and Supply Chain Management Arm

Featured Article, Press Release

ASRC Federal finalized the acquisition of the logistics and supply chain management business of Science Applications International Corporation (NYSE: SAIC). With this acquisition, ASRC Federal adds 240 professionals to the company who bring with them more than 40 ...read more

ASRC Federal Acquires Broadleaf, Inc., Expanding Presence with DoD and Federal Civilian Agency Customers

Featured Article, Press Release

Deal Accelerates Growth with U.S. Army, U.S. Navy and the Defense Counterintelligence and Security Agency ASRC Federal announces the acquisition of Broadleaf, Inc., which provides leading information technology services including cybersecurity, network engineering read more
